docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: A quarter-century after the start of the women's rights movement, American women say that despite their gains, it is still a man's world.

headline.main: Bars to Equality of Sexes Seen as Eroding, Slowly

docs.snippet: LEAD: A quarter-century after the start of the women's rights movement, American women say that despite their gains, it is still a man's world.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Several large employers have been stymied in their efforts to shift some of the soaring costs of medical care to unionized workers in contract settlements this year. Organized labor has in some significant cases successfully resisted concessions already made by nonunion employees.
docs.snippet: LEAD: Several large employers have been stymied in their efforts to shift some of the soaring costs of medical care to unionized workers in contract settlements this year. Organized labor has in some significant cases successfully resisted...

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Nursing mothers who have one or more alcoholic drinks a day may pass on enough alcohol in their milk to slightly retard their children's motor development, making them a little slower to learn to crawl and walk, a study suggests.

headline.main: CAUTION ABOUT ALCOHOL FOR NURSING MOTHERS

docs.snippet: LEAD: Nursing mothers who have one or more alcoholic drinks a day may pass on enough alcohol in their milk to slightly retard their children's motor development, making them a little slower to learn to crawl and walk, a study suggests.
